name: Aung San Suu Kyi
office: Chairperson and General Secretary of the National League for Democracy
office1: Member of the Burmese House of Representatives, for Kawhmu
alma_mater: University of Delhi, St Hugh's College, Oxford, University of London
data1: Rafto Prize, Nobel Peace Prize - Aung San Suu Kyi herself has been very clear about this– she is extremely busy. She can't do everything in this country - reference http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2012/dec/20/burma-rohingya-muslim-refugee-camps, Jawaharlal Nehru Award, International Simón Bolívar Prize, Olof Palme Prize, Bhagwan Mahavir World Peace, Congressional Gold Medal
